customer_reviews.title: does not last

It has a 3 year warranty so we shall see. Hopefully, I can come back and update this post with a better review.

customer_reviews.title: No stand, no laser/worklight
customer_reviews.text: My saw came with no stand, laser or worklight. Looked like a well built saw, but I returned it as I wanted a saw with a laser guide for a specific task. I called the manufacturer and they no longer make a saw with a laser guide. Amazon needs to update the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Sunfixer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price in a lightweight and powerful package
customer_reviews.text: I was about ready to tear my hair out, trying to cut incredibly detailed glass tile for a clients kitchen backsplash. Ordered the Beast based on the reviews, and to be honest, the cost. I didn't want to spring for an MK, and this actually seemed to be a better deal for the price. Used it for the first time today, and was thrilled with the ease of use, consistent precision of the cuts, and the surprising light weight of the unit. If it keeps performing the way it did today - and I see no reason why it shouldn't - I will be a confirmed and enthusiastic supporter of this tile saw brand!
customer_reviews.author: Pgr

customer_reviews.title: I would like to see a fitting in order to attach a ...
customer_reviews.text: This machine is well suited for the professional tile cutter, however mine came with the sliding table not exactly perpendicular to the blade and as a result on a 12 inch cut, the end of the cut piece is 1/16th inch shorter than the start. Also the pan drain allows water to splash everywhere. I would like to see a fitting in order to attach a hose. Otherwise I would give this rugged machine a strong recommendation.

customer_reviews.title: High quality wet saw
customer_reviews.text: I needed a quality saw to cut floor tile and that's what I got. The sliding table is the reason I chose this saw,no racking( side to side movement) which gives you a straight cut. Cutting 12x24 cuts straight. The plunge feature works great. Water spray is well controlled with flaps and extension tray. Laser and Led light help to make your work easier. The stand is sturdy and mobile and breaks down quick if you had to take it apart. Powerful saw will cut anything you dare accurately. I ran the pump out of a bucket to keep clean water supply . A quality product for anyone who needs a wet saw.

customer_reviews.title: Appropriate name indeed!
customer_reviews.text: "The Beast" is a very fitting name for this monster, although you could also call it "The Tank", " Cherno Alpha", or just "Tile Killer". Everything about this saw is rugged, including the wheeled stand. This is not some wimpy Ryobi or Rigid DIY'er toy. This thing was sent through the Breach with one intended purpose, to reduce large tiles into slightly smaller tiles! Note that this is also the same saw as the Bosch TC10 wet tile saw, except that it is slightly cheaper and comes with a much better stand, IMO. Be prepared to invest in a van or powered liftgate to haul this monster around.

product_meta.title: Lackmond Beast Wet Tile Saw - 7" Portable Jobsite Cutting Tool with Gravity Folding Stand & Accessories - BEAST7PKIT
product_meta.description: Our new beast 7" wet tile saw is capable of performing a Diagonal cut on a 18" x 18" tile and can execute a 24" rip cut. Equipped with a powerful 13 amp motor, our 7" tile saw is comparable to most 10" tile saws on the market. Our direct drive motor rotates to ensure accurate 22.5⁰ and 45⁰ bevel cuts. The plunge cut feature makes it easy to execute v-cap cuts, cut-outs for wall sockets and much more. The beast-7 comes with an innovative Snake pipe water nozzle which allows for precise water control and placement while minimizing overspray. The durable steel pipe saw frame is constructed to withstand the toughest conditions. The BEAST7PKIT wet tile saw kit includes Trays, side Table & beast Scissor stand and comes with a 3-year warranty!.
feature_bullets: The beast 7" wet tile saw is capable of performing a Diagonal cut on a 18" x 18" tile and can execute a 24" rip cut. Our 7" tile saw is comparable to most 10" tile saws on the market.
Powerful 13 amp direct drive motor rotates to ensure accurate 22.5⁰ and 45⁰ bevel cuts. The plunge cut feature makes it easy to execute v-cap cuts, cut-outs for wall sockets, and much more.
Durable steel pipe saw frame is constructed to withstand the toughest conditions. Tube steel provides excellent strength without adding excess weight.
Snake-pipe water system provides absolute control over the placement and volume of water hitting the blade.
